description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. RC Flight Simulator plus 3 mini-games. Fly RC Airplanes using different camera modes including chase cam. Select from 8 planes on five courses. Balloon Pop, pop as many balloons as you can. Bomb Drop, drop bombs on targets and try for Bullseyes. Race Mode, race the courses for three laps. Compete for a high score ranking or online against other players in the mini-games. Earn 12 in-game awards.
